name: Deathless
description:
Deathless is a short Cyberpunk RPG, where you play as a failed criminal who has returned home after a run-in with some  high-level gangsters. Explore a ruthless town and try to regain your respect in a world of liars and thieves. 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:
Arrow keys to move.
X to interact.
Z to cancel.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Title track is Duplex by Mo Rooneh, available on Free Music Archive.
